display_long_description:
Spatial TV is the ultimate app to watch movies in VR. People love the amazing ambient light that transforms your home into a movie theater. 

**Dim your environment and immerse in the amazing lighting effect**
[media]

**Glow your screen**
[media]

**Supports YouTube, Disney+, HBO Max, Hulu, Apple TV+ and more**

There's also a built-in browser to access any video you love from the internet!

[media]

**You will also love**

- Optimized screen clarity with 3840 x 2160 super-sampled pixels per eye

- Making the screen really huge and enjoying your favorite videos while lying back

- Super flexible screen placement and intuitive design

**Enjoy the breathtaking ambient light now!**

[media]

Note: Netflix is not supported on Spatial TV yet
